about_the_game: TentaCat: The Lost Lineage is a retro 16-bit styled action platformer that introduces players to Aqua, an exceptional octopus-cat hybrid discovered as an egg on a secluded island by traveling merchants. Acquired by the scientist Dr. Schenkenberg, Aqua is raised as his own child. Estranged from his species, Aqua, and Dr. Schenkenberg embark on a journey to revisit our main character's birthplace. Spanning 14 meticulously crafted levels, players will navigate through various obstacles, collecting distinctive items and power-ups, and fight various bosses as they unravel the enigma surrounding the elusive TentaCats on the mysterious island.
detailed_description: TentaCat: The Lost Lineage is a retro 16-bit styled action platformer that introduces players to Aqua, an exceptional octopus-cat hybrid discovered as an egg on a secluded island by traveling merchants. Acquired by the scientist Dr. Schenkenberg, Aqua is raised as his own child. Estranged from his species, Aqua, and Dr. Schenkenberg embark on a journey to revisit our main character's birthplace. Spanning 14 meticulously crafted levels, players will navigate through various obstacles, collecting distinctive items and power-ups, and fight various bosses as they unravel the enigma surrounding the elusive TentaCats on the mysterious island.

name: TentaCat: The Lost Lineage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Core i3-7100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: TentaCat: Lost Lineage is a retro 16-bit action platformer where you play as Aqua, a TentaCat separated from his birthplace on a secluded island and wants to find his own kind. Journey through 14 levels, collecting items and power-ups, fighting bosses and unraveling mysteries of the TentaCats.
